The Lenovo Limited Warranty applies only to Lenovo hardware products purchased for your own use, and does not transfer upon resale., 8754=The Wireless Mouse N3901A uses 2.4 GHz wireless technology which lets you enjoy complete control without messy cables. The 1000 dpi optical sensor provides smooth and precise tracking. It comes with a tiny USB receiver that can stay in your computer - plug it in and forget it. Additional features include both Back and Shift keys to allow for easier web browsing and an integrated On/Off switch to conserve battery power when not in use.}
